title: Black T-shirt
descriptionShort: It's a basic crew neck style with short sleeves and appears to be made from a standard cotton or cotton-blend fabric...
descriptionLong: It's a basic crew neck style with short sleeves and appears to be made from a standard cotton or cotton-blend fabric. The t-shirt has no visible graphics, text, patterns, or design elements. It's a classic unisex style that would serve as a versatile basic item in a wardrobe.

title: Black Polo
descriptionShort: A sleek charcoal gray polo shirt crafted from what appears to be a performance fabric with subtle texture...
descriptionLong: A sleek charcoal gray polo shirt crafted from what appears to be a performance fabric with subtle texture. Features a traditional collar, short sleeves, and a three-button placket. The modern cut and technical-looking material suggest moisture-wicking properties, making it suitable for both casual wear and athletic activities.

title: Blue Polo
descriptionShort: A classic navy blue polo shirt featuring a traditional fold-down collar and partial button placket...
descriptionLong: A classic navy blue polo shirt featuring a traditional fold-down collar and partial button placket. Appears to be crafted from smooth piqu√© cotton with short sleeves and a comfortable regular fit. This timeless style bridges the gap between casual and smart casual, making it appropriate for various occasions.

title: Grey T-shirt
descriptionShort: A fitted gray t-shirt with a clean crew neck design and short sleeves...
descriptionLong: A fitted gray t-shirt with a clean crew neck design and short sleeves. Made from what appears to be a smooth, possibly moisture-wicking athletic fabric with a slight sheen. The streamlined silhouette makes it ideal for layering or wearing alone for workouts or casual everyday wear.

title: White Longsleeve Shirt
descriptionShort: A clean white long-sleeve t-shirt featuring a classic crew neck design...
descriptionLong: A clean white long-sleeve t-shirt featuring a classic crew neck design. Crafted from what appears to be standard cotton jersey fabric, it provides additional arm coverage and warmth. This essential layering piece works well under sweaters or jackets in cooler weather or can be worn on its own for a simple, minimalist look.

title: Black Dress Pants
descriptionShort: Sophisticated black dress pants crafted from what appears to be a wool or wool-blend fabric with a subtle sheen...
descriptionLong: Sophisticated black dress pants crafted from what appears to be a wool or wool-blend fabric with a subtle sheen. Features a flat front design, sharp pressed center crease, and tailored silhouette. These refined slacks are suitable for business professional environments, formal occasions, or can be paired with more casual pieces for smart casual attire.

title: Cargo Jeans
descriptionShort: Loose-fitting blue denim jeans designed with an intentionally oversized, baggy silhouette...
descriptionLong: Loose-fitting blue denim jeans designed with an intentionally oversized, baggy silhouette. Features multiple large utility cargo pockets on the sides and legs, combining streetwear aesthetics with functional storage. The relaxed cut and utility-focused design reflect contemporary urban fashion trends.

title: Sweatpants
descriptionShort: Contemporary dark gray jogger pants combining athletic functionality with street style...
descriptionLong: Contemporary dark gray jogger pants combining athletic functionality with street style. Features an elastic waistband likely with drawstring, tapered legs, and elastic cuffs at the ankles. Made from what appears to be a soft, possibly cotton-blend or technical fabric, offering comfort and mobility for both active and leisure wear.

title: Ripped Jeans
descriptionShort: Light-wash denim jeans featuring extensive distressing and multiple tears across the front thighs and knees...
descriptionLong: Light-wash denim jeans featuring extensive distressing and multiple tears across the front thighs and knees. Cut in a straight or slightly tapered leg silhouette with traditional five-pocket styling. The deliberate worn aesthetic creates a casual, lived-in look perfect for creating relaxed outfits with an edge.

title: Black Dress Shoes
descriptionShort: Elegant black leather oxford dress shoes with a formal aesthetic...
descriptionLong: Elegant black leather oxford dress shoes with a formal aesthetic. Showcases a sleek silhouette with closed lacing, minimal stitching, and a polished leather finish. The refined shape features a slightly pointed toe and modest heel height. These timeless shoes are essential for formal attire, business professional settings, and special occasions.

title: Chelsea Boots
descriptionShort: Refined brown leather Chelsea boots featuring the signature elastic side panels for easy slip-on wear...
descriptionLong: Refined brown leather Chelsea boots featuring the signature elastic side panels for easy slip-on wear. The polished leather upper has a rich patina, complemented by a moderate heel and slightly pointed toe. These versatile boots blend classic British design with contemporary styling, suitable for both casual and more formal ensembles.

title: Leather Running Shoes
descriptionShort: Versatile brown leather oxford shoes bridging casual and semi-formal styles...
descriptionLong: Versatile brown leather oxford shoes bridging casual and semi-formal styles. Features include distinctive contrast stitching, rounded toes, traditional lace-up closure, and rubber outsoles for comfort and traction. The relaxed interpretation of the classic oxford design makes these suitable for business casual settings or smart weekend wear.

title: Timberlands
descriptionShort: Robust tan leather boots designed for work or hiking environments...
descriptionLong: Robust tan leather boots designed for work or hiking environments. Features include a padded ankle collar, metal hardware with durable laces, and thick rubber lug soles providing excellent traction on varied terrain. The practical design combines durability and comfort while the wheat/tan color offers a more casual look than traditional black or dark brown work boots.

title: Blue Baseball Cap
descriptionShort: A traditional six-panel baseball cap in vibrant blue featuring a structured front with a small embroidered logo...
descriptionLong: A traditional six-panel baseball cap in vibrant blue featuring a structured front with a small embroidered logo. Includes an adjustable strap at the back for customized fit. Perfect for casual wear or sun protection during outdoor activities.

title: Green Beanie
descriptionShort: A cozy olive green beanie crafted from knitted fabric with a classic silhouette...
descriptionLong: A cozy olive green beanie crafted from knitted fabric with a classic silhouette. Features a traditional folded edge at the bottom that can be adjusted for different styles and warmth levels. This versatile winter accessory combines practicality with a military-inspired color that complements many outfits.

title: Yellow Bucket Hat
descriptionShort: A cheerful yellow bucket hat made from what appears to be sturdy cotton or canvas material...
descriptionLong: A cheerful yellow bucket hat made from what appears to be sturdy cotton or canvas material. Features the characteristic all-around downward-sloping brim providing excellent sun protection. The vibrant color and casual silhouette make it a playful accessory for spring and summer outfits.
